title: I want to connect to my Work wireless network. However, I can't because 'None' is missing
content:
I want to connect to my Work wireless network. However, I can't because 'None' is missing from the selectable list of Phase 2 Authentication. 
There is no option to select none as it is missing. 
It's problem with Google Pixel 4a or from Android 11?? Any solution plz help
